title: Mystery Tales 2: The Twilight World [BETA] 2014 (PC) Foxy Games
description:
Game Info:
***********
Mystery Tales: The Twilight World
Version 0.1.3206.0 (11.07.2014)
Crack: Velocity/RAZZ
RePacked by: Foxy Games
Released: November 2014
Size: 460 Mb
Platform: PC / Windows
Genre(s): Hidden Object / Puzzle

About Cheats:
**************
Use "run.bat" file to start the game. It will let you to use the following cheats in the game:
    F2 - move your mouse over object with which you need to use some object from inventory and click "F2". The object you need will apear in your inventory.
    F4 - skip puzzle. Or move to next step of puzzle.
    F5 - used for instantaneous passing HO Screen 
    F7 - used to call the list of all in-game items. The items can be chosen from the list and added to the inventory. 
    PgUp/Pgn - increase or decrease current object's state.
    Tab - to highlight all active objects in the scene.
    V - use it at the main page to get all achievements.
	H Ã¢â‚¬â€œ  recharge hint button
	S Ã¢â‚¬â€œ recharge skip button
	K - collect one item in HO scene
	U Ã¢â‚¬â€œ unblock Extra content

Instructions:
**************
1.Download
2.Install
3.Play and Have Fun 
4.Keep Seeding!
